comment.author: 76361453@N00
comment._content: Another image from Flickr. This one closely matching the angle of this archival picture. You can see the dome in the far background. New buildings have propped up on the opposite side of the road where the lamp post is AND the traffic has increased :D The EXIF of the new picture shows Nov 2010. I was born less than 1KM away from this place. I have passed by this road so many times, but can never image that this place could have looked so calm and peaceful. I wish it had remained like this forever.

comment.author: 61498590@N03
comment._content: Great photos. Thanks for sharing! Yes, I can imagine quite a lot has changed in 130 years.
